Text:
I just finished watching the last season (#11) and it is one of the best sitcoms on TV.

Thanks for the upload.

Works perfectly and looks awesome quality in DivX player but doesn't seem to work in anything else. Won't convert (chokes several converters I have). Seems to be all .mkv files but with something missing or invalid besides the .avi thing. Am I the only one with issues?  Either way, thanks for the upload!
mkpelikan: try with vlc player or with thek-lite codec pack for the windows media player. worked fine for me
